description: The US “absolutely” supports a two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict but is thinking of new ways to push for a peace deal.
title: Trump Administration ‘Thinking Out-of-the-Box’ on Israeli-Palestinian Conflict
title_page: Trump Administration ‘Thinking Out-of-the-Box’ on Israeli-Palestinian Conflict
text:
The Times of Israel reports: UNITED NATIONS — The United States “absolutely” supports a two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict but is thinking of new ways to push for a peace deal, US Ambassador Nikki Haley (pictured) said Thursday.
It would be an “error” to say the United States is abandoning its decades-old policy of backing a Palestinian state as part of a final settlement, she told reporters.
“We absolutely support a two-state solution, but we are thinking out-of-the-box as well,” Haley said following a Security Council meeting on the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
Read more here.
